
TEMPS_NIVEAU= 120
TEMPS_MUR= 30
VITESSE_SLIM= 8
NOMBRE_DIAMANT= 10
LONGUEURX= 40
LONGUEURY= 22

#0P0PP000000 00P000P0000 000P00000DP0P0#
# P00P000  000P00P0 00P0P000MMMMMMMMMMM#
#000D 00P0 100000P00000 00000000PP P00P#
#MMMMMMMMMMMM00P0P0000 0  000000P  P00P#
#0  000 00P0  00P0  0000 PPP00000  P00 #
#000 P000 100 00P0  00000P0PP00P0 0 P00#
#00P0 00P0 P0000 00000 000P P00P0000 00#
#00000P 000000 0  1PP0 000  P00 0P0000P#
#P0P000 0 P000000 00P000P0000P0000DP0  #
#000000P0 P000000000 P00P000MMMMMMMMMMM#
#0PP000000 00P0 000 00P0  00P0  000 P00#
#MMMMMMMMMMMMP00000000 000P000000P0PP00#
#00P000 000D00P0 00P0PP0000000000P0PP00#
#00 00P0 0P000-------0000000000  P00P00#
#P00 P0000P00P P000D 00 0000000  P00P00#
# 000 00P0 000P0  00000PPPP00P0 0 P00 P#
#0 P0010P0000 0  000000PP P00P000  000P#
#P0  00P0  00000P0P0 000  P00P0000 000P#
#000  0P0P 00000P0P00000   00 0P0000P00#
